title: Exploring the role of artificial intelligence in public sector innovation: Cases from the European Union
research_description: This study examines the role of AI in public sector innovation across various cases in the European Union, focusing on how AI is being used to improve public service delivery and governance.
research_results: The study finds that AI is primarily used in the context of improving service delivery, automating routine tasks, and enabling more efficient management of public resources.
future_research: Further research should investigate the long-term impacts of AI adoption on transparency, accountability, and the role of human decision-making in public sector innovation.
